Fields.DialogueText: Kapitän, we've just been alerted of a group of Nixen not far from here.
Good to know. We can rendezvous with the task force off Bergen and...
Actually, I was hoping we might find the time to attackieren them ourselves. I want to show you what I can do now. Really prove to you that I'm... shipshape, as it were.

Fields.MenuText: That sounds like a great idea to me.
We can make a detour, if it's important to you.
I'm not so sure that's a good idea...

Fields.DialogueText: Really? Perfect. I was hoping you'd agree with me.
It is. I want you to know that I'm not going to let any more of my personal... Probleme affect my Leistung.
Warum nicht? Respectfully, Kapitän, I'm just asking for a Chance.
Very well. Let's head out and fight some Morganas.
Danke, Kapitän.
Of course.
That was a pleasant exchange we had, just now.
Gell? I'd like to think those arguments of ours are in the past now, Kapitän.
Let's hope so.
@BATTLE
Excellent work with that last battle, Hipper. I have to say, you met every expectation I had.
Wirklich? There wasn't anything you were unhappy with?
I want you to tell me the absolute truth. I can take it, Kapitän.

Fields.MenuText: No, you were perfect, Hipper. Those Morganas didn't stand a chance against us.
Well, I'll admit, I sometimes wish there was a little more power behind your shots. But that isn't any fault of yours.
I suppose next time, we might want to focus on avoiding more of the Morganas' attacks.

Fields.DialogueText: Ah geh, Kapitän. You're going to make me blush.
I understand what you mean. I'm fast, but my Bewaffnung is lacking somewhat as a Resultat.
Ah jo, you have a point there. I may have been too focused on proving myself and dealing damage to the Feind. I ought not forget the safety of the Schiff. Ich entschuldige mich.
All in all, Hipper, I have to say, you've impressed me greatly. The improvements you've made are commendable.
Danke, Kapitän. But I know I can't stop here. I must continue to grow.
As should we all.
*ALARM*
Well, some of us should just know when to lay down and die!
If there's one compliment we can give the Morganas, it's that they're determined.
I'd really rather not give them any Kompliment. Ever.
That seems reasonable.
@BATTLE
Hipper, I have some news I think you'll be overjoyed to hear.
I'm all Ohr, Kapitän.
We've received a new task.
Us specifically?
Exactly. Apparently, someone in Command thinks you're perfect for the job.
Heh, well, I mean I'm perfect for most Aufträge. What are the Einzelheiten?
We've got a group of Morganas causing trouble near the east coast of the U.S. - around the Carolinas. Command doesn't have many details, but they know the group is enough of a threat to ask for help.
Defeating a powerful group of Nixen? That is the perfekte Einsatz for me!

Fields.MenuText: I have to agree.
Someone has a high opinion of herself.
How about, it's the perfect job for us?

Fields.DialogueText: It's good to pull on the same Strang.
Do I need to funk to Doktor Hendrick?
That *ist* better. Let's head on out, Kapitän.
*ALARM*
Now? And we were just about to set off.
Actually, we really should restock im Hafen before going off on our new Mission.
Very well. Morganas first. Port second.
@BATTLE
Oh, please no.
Iiiiiieh!
Hipper, what's going on?
I found a Kakerlake in the hall! I had to step on das böse kleine Monster ten times before it finally stopped moving!

Fields.MenuText: A bug? That's what had you screaming bloody murder?
Get that thing away from me. I don't want to see all its guts on the floor.
Nice kill, Hipper. Should we have it stuffed and mounted on your wall?

Fields.DialogueText: Not just any Käfer. A huge Kakerlake. It's all over my Stiefel now!
Ugh, don't make me think... ugh. I think I might, bäh, I can't look at it. I don't even want to think about it.
I can't think of anything more disturbing, Kapitän.
This isn't good, Kapitän. This is the beginning of a Plage.
One bug does not an infestation make.
I don't have Käfer. I won't stand for it. And once I find out where this Ungeheuer came from, heads will roll.
*ALARM*
How about we start with a few Morgana heads?
Fine... just let me wash off my Stiefel. I can hear the squishing sound everytime I take a step. Bäh!
@BATTLE
Nixen upon us. Pack mers?
We've got this.
@BATTLE
How's our restocking going? Think we'll have enough supplies to reach our destination?
Without a doubt. My Mannschaft knows how I like things done by now. I've never run out of any supply on Bord unexpectedly, Kapitän.
Really?
You don't believe me?
No... I mean, of course, I...
Verzeihung. I didn't mean to... I'm just a little worked up.
What's wrong?
I've been wracking my brain, trying to figure out where that despicable Schabe came from.

Fields.MenuText: You're still on that? I think it's best to let it go.
Do you need help? I'm right here, you know.
Maybe it was a sea roach. It could've flown aboard. Or burrowed its way through the steel.

Fields.DialogueText: I will not. I'm resolute on this matter. I... I just cannot stand the thought of Käfer on my Schiff, Kapitän.
Well... I suppose we could work together and check the whole Schiff, Raum für Raum.
Please, be serious, Kapitän. This really bothers me. The least you could do is not make Witze.
Uh, Hipper. We have an issue resupplying the ship with... toilet paper.
What?
Oh, that's not something you want to run out of on a long voyage.
Give me a Moment, Kapitän. I need to deal with this.
Take your time.
Of course. My apologies, Hipper.
Hey, Hipper, good job on the supplies.
Danke, Kapitän. We are fully stocked now.
Good! And I hope you've been able to get past the supposed infestation.
Ja, Kapitän. As we've left the Hafen, I'm doing my best to focus on our new assignment, and not those... widerlichen, krabbelnden, vielbeinigen, creepy, vile...
Bugs?
Kapitän, hush. l said I've let it go.
Have you?
Ja! Ja absolut! Are you trying to start something with me, Kapitän?

Fields.MenuText: Woah! Sorry, I was just having a little fun.
No! I swear I was just asking. I didn't mean to bug you. Ha..
Sorry, Hipper - I didn't realize how seriously you took the subject.

Fields.DialogueText: Auf meine Kosten! I absolutely detest... those things.
Ho-ho, clever, Kapitän! But you did just that.
How could you not? You're not that dense, Kapitän.
I hate Kakerlaken. I hate Käfer, in general. And that's all we need to say about the Thema, gell?
Okay... but is it hate, or fear?
*ALARM*
It's Hass. And let me show you what I do to things I hate.
I hope she's talking about the Morganas.
@BATTLE
So this is where that group of Nixen was last spotted?
Yes. From the reports, it seems they've made some sort of hive or colony here.
How disturbing.
You're not wrong. We'll need to discuss strategy on how to deal with this swarm.
Huäärk... You're doing this on purpose.
I don't know what you mean. We've been tasked with taking care of this infestation is all.
Würg! Then let's stop talking and get in there.

Fields.MenuText: Okay, I was running out of bug terms anyway.
Are you sure we should just run straight into the spider's web?
If I stop teasing you, can we take some time and come up with a plan?

Fields.DialogueText: Thank heavens for that. I've had enough Schauder running up and down my spine.
You know, Spinnen aren't nearly as bad for me. It's kind of like... der Feind meines Feindes ist mein Freund. You know?
Maybe... if I actually believed you were able to stop yourself.
Okay, let's go then. I just hope, for your sake, that there aren't six legged and bug eyed Morganas in there with antennae and exoskeletons.
That's not a thing, is it?!
*ALARM*
Well, there goes the element of surprise.
Hey, don't change the Thema!
I didn't. They did. Come on, Hipper.
But... There aren't really Nixen like that... right?
@BATTLE
Hipper? What the hell is wrong with you?
THEY'RE CRAWLING WITH KÄFERN!
What? I was joking about that before. You know that, right?
Kapitän, seriously! Look - beady eyes and pincers! Ack, I can't even stand to look in that direction!

Fields.MenuText: Hmmm, I guess I can kind of see it. It must be some new camouflage.
What are you talking about? It's just designs they've painted on their hulls.
I'm only now realizing that I shouldn't have been having so much fun with you before.

Fields.DialogueText: See, it's not just me now. So can we just turn around and head home now? Yeah, that sounds like a good idea. Let's do that.
They're not just designs! THEY'RE MOVING! One look and I can feel Fühler all over me. You know, that's how Käfer talk. They're practically licking me!
For the last time it wasn't fun! And neither is this! This is my Alptraum.
*BOOM*
Hipper, I'm gonna need you to snap out of it.
But, did you see...
Yeah, yeah, I saw, but that's no excuse for your behavior right now. Are you going to let that Morgana vermin blow us out of the water and eat us for lunch?
Käferfutter?! I don't want to be bug food!
Then let's smash that pest.
Ughhh, I hate... I hate Käfer!
Fire everything we have at that disgusting thing!
There's the Hipper I was looking for.
@BATTLE
Oh, great, we took out the big one, but now we're getting swarmed by all its little friends.
The Dronen come to avenge their Königin...
Hipper... They're not bugs, they're Morganas. Stay with me here.
I hate Insekten. We have to kill all of these disgusting Kreaturen!

Fields.MenuText: Hipper... you're starting to scare me a little.
Damn straight! Let's send them all to bug hell!
I thought you were too scared to fight 'em.

Fields.DialogueText: You're not the one who should be scared. They're the ones who should be quaking at the sight of me!
They'll burn for all eternity once I crush them under my heel!
I'm not afraid of Käfer. I'm not. I just really, really hate them!
Well, I guess this is better than shaking at the sight of them.
Hit them with everything we've got! Don't let them get any closer! Kill them all! Schießt sie in Stücke!
You heard the lady!
@BATTLE
Kapitän, I... I really need to apologize for my behavior during that last encounter.
You mean when you were unloading all of our ammo like a madwoman, or when you were almost crying like a baby?
Both, but mostly the second one.

Fields.MenuText: All's well that ends well, ya know?
Well, I wouldn't exactly call your performance commendable.
I didn't realize bugs had such an effect on you.

Fields.DialogueText: Ja, but nein.
But...?
Tja, also, I wish they didn't, but they do, and it happened.
I... shouldn't have reacted that way. We had a Mission, and, while I normalerweise put the Mission above all else, I let my basic Instinkte get the better of me. There is no excuse.
Hipper, you sound like I'm gonna send you to get decommissioned or something.
If that was what you wanted...
It's not.
I... Danke, Kapitän. I won't let you down. Thank you for this second Chance!
It's not a second chance, you were never in any...
Ich mache mich sofort an die Arbeit. We used a lot of supplies in that last encounter. I'll set course for a Hafen straight away.
Wait, I... Oh, never mind, she's already off. Eager to prove herself, as always.
@BATTLE
No "but."
Oh, it just seemed like you might have had more to...
Hipper. Your apology?
Ahhhhh, nein, nein, nein, nein, nein, nein, nein, nein, nein, nein!
Hipper, what's going on?
Two of them this time, Kapitän. Two unwelcome blinde Passagiere skittering across the floor.

Fields.MenuText: Oh no... They're multiplying.
Just two? Hardly seems like a problem to me.
Same kind as the last one?

Fields.DialogueText: Eben! Two is all they need to make more.
For every Insekt you see, there are a hundred you don't see. Do the math, Kapitän.
They were creepy and krabbelig. That's all that matters.
Did you at least smash the two that you saw?
Ask the bottom of my Stiefel. And now I'm thinking about all the gross guts. Go get me something to wipe it off, Kapitän, bitte!
*ALARM*
Sounds like that'll have to wait. Or better yet, you could wipe them off on the Morganas.
I can't walk all the way to the Deck like this. Just give me your Mantel or something, Kapitän.
No! Use your own coat, or... something. We just need to hurry.
@BATTLE
Hipper, why did you call me down here? And where actually is here?
It's a supply closet. Just look. Bitte.
Why are you hiding behind me? Aren't you supposed to be leading the way?
Just look down, See that Kiste?
Hmmm... You mean this thi...
Don't touch it!
Why... Holy, that's a huge bug!
That's why we have Käfer, Kapitän!
Did we get bugs delivered to us or something?
I don't know, I don't know! Just close the Tür before any of those things get out.
My main Theorie is that someone put an extra Kiste of food down here and then forgot about it.
Sounds a little out of character for you. Don't you like to make sure everything's in its place?
That's why it's just a Theorie. It could also be Sabotage...
Like... A prank or something? I suppose there are some mischievous Belles who could've played a trick on you.
Pah, a Schabernack? This was worse than any simple Schabernack. This could mean total war.

Fields.MenuText: If that's what you want, I'm behind you, Hipper.
Aren't you being a little dramatic?
A prank war?! I'm so in!

Fields.DialogueText: That means a lot, Kapitän, but I'd rather not escalate things that quickly. I could be wrong after all.
I am not being dramatic! I'm responding appropriately to the Situation in the closet!
You seem a little too eager for this, Kapitän. Almost... suspiciously eager...
What are we going to do about our little friends in there?
They are no friends of mine. I'll have an Offizer, or maybe two, handle its disposal. I'll... oversee them from a safe distance to make sure they've destroyed every single one.
Well, sounds fun, I guess. While you're doing that, I'll go make sure we don't run into any Morganas.
I mean, I can fight Nixen, too. I can handle both tasks.
I'm sure you can, Hipper.
@BATTLE
Hmmm.
How's our resupply going, Hipper?
Everything's in Ordnung. And I'm making damn sure that's the case.

Fields.MenuText: That sounds... ominous.
Good. That's the kind of work ethic I like to see from you.
Weren't you before though?

Fields.DialogueText: It's only ominous for any potential six legged Invasoren.
Well, danke, Kapitän. I'm here to please.
Well, ja - but I'm now taking extra measures to insure all of our safety from the Insektengefahr.
So what exactly are these extra measures you're taking?
You know how I can phase through walls? Well, I can also phase through supply Kisten. It's easier to know what exactly you're getting when you can feel it passing through you.
Oh... interesting. What if one of the boxes actually is filled with bugs or something?
Hhhhuuugghh... I didn't... I didn't even think of that.
Well, that's what I'm here for, right?
I'm... I'm going to figure out another way to make sure we're only getting what we're ordering. Blergh!
Still thinking about it?
How could I not be?
@BATTLE
Hipper, I have some good news for you.
Ja? I am in sore need of something uplifting right about now. Even if it's just a small cup of Rote Grütze.
Rote Grütze? I never took you for a sweet tooth.
Well, I bet you also didn't know I collect Münzen. There are many sides to me, Kapitän.
I didn't, but I know now. And now my news doesn't seem all that good.
You should still tell me anyway. It'd be rude not to.
We have a new mission. Another dangerous Morgana we've tasked with destroying.
That's fantastic Neuigkeiten. I still need to redeem myself for last time.

Fields.MenuText: You need to do no such thing, Hipper.
It was pretty embarrassing. You should've seen your face.
Last time? Honestly, I've already forgotten.

Fields.DialogueText: Says you. And honestly, I think you may be a little voreingenommen.
You don't have to remind me. I'd rather block that Mission out for all of eternity.
Well, I'll never forget. It'll haunt me until the day I die.
I hope to one day decorate this Uniform in Orden, Kapitän. The way to do that is Kampf. Not shaking like a leaf at the first sight of a... Ja, let's stop talking about that last Mission!
Getting flashbacks?
Let's just talk about something else, bitte.
@BATTLE
What are you doing down here, Hipper? Trying to sneak a snack in? How out of character for you.
Was? Nein - I'm doing Inventur again. I'm making sure nothing has molded or spoiled.
Oh... Sure, that's more in character.
We're still not even sure where that Kiste came from, or how long it had been on board. I'm not letting that mistake happen again.

Fields.MenuText: Okay, just let me know if there's something I can do to help, Hipper.
It's not the end of the world if it does happen again though, right?
I think you might be working yourself a little too hard.

Fields.DialogueText: I'd love some Hülfe, but the only way I can be positiv, is if I do it all myself... Unfortunately.
Falsch! The world will end, Nixen will win. And the Mannschaft might as well be replaced with Insekten. I have to run myself ragged to make sure it doesn't happen again.
I'm fine, Kapitän. Thank you for your consideration though.
Though... I really would love to spend just an entire day at a Kur, or... at a Masseuse. Oh, that would be heaven.
If you need a break, Hipper, I can...
Nein, I'll be fine. I'm fine. I just need to finish this.
You trying to convince me, or yourself?
You, obviously. I'm fine. Perfectly fine.
@BATTLE
I'm always impressed with how fast you can move, Hipper. We're making terrific time.
You know what I'm impressed with? How much our relationship has improved in such a short amount of time.
We've come a long way, Kapitän.

Fields.MenuText: Relationship?! What do you mean by that?
Yeah, I can't remember the last time you really irritated me.
It wasn't that long ago that every other thing I said set you off. I'm glad that's not the case anymore.

Fields.DialogueText: I mean our relationship as Kapitän and Walküre. Our Interaktionen with each other. What did you think I meant?
I irritated you? I think it was the other way around, Kapitän.
Me too. You know it wasn't always what you were saying, right? I can also be overly defensiv.
I suppose I should send Hendrick my thanks. You think a fruit basket would be appropriate?
I don't see why not.
Well, I don't want him to think I'm a basket case.
*ALARM*
I think the Nixen want an Obstkorb as well.
Come on, it was funny.
@BATTLE
It's okay to laugh.
About what?
Also, Kapitän?
What is it?
What exactly should I be expecting from this Nixen we're targeting?

Fields.MenuText: Well, I wouldn't expect it to give up without a fight.
Death, destruction, evilness, you know, Morgana stuff.
Shouldn't be anything we can't handle.

Fields.DialogueText: Nixen never do, but that's not really what I was asking.
I'd rather hear some more Spezifikationen.
I appreciate your confidence, but I'd appreciate Details even more.
I was hoping, specifically, to learn something about the Nixens appearance.
Oh, now I understand. You don't have to worry. Why do you think I made sure our next assignment was so far away.
Why did you?
I'm not quite sure how Morgana localization works, but I figure that the further we get from the Morgana that rattled you, the less likely we'll run into a similar one.
That actually makes a lot of sense, Kapitän. And I'm... flattered that you'd do something like that for me.
Well, you're an importa...
But I don't need you to take extra Maßnahmen to make me happy. I can handle anything.
... Sure you can.
Ja. I can. Though, just to clarify, our Ziel doesn't look anything like our last Ziel?
Not from the reports.
Oh, thank goodness.
@BATTLE
Unexpected Nixen appearing before us.
All right - we've got 'em in our sights.
@BATTLE
Kapitän, I think we might need to make a Umweg.
Huh? What are we having problems restocking?
Nein, das ist es nicht. Apparently some massive Nixen has been lurking nearby, attacking any Schiff that gets close.
So you want us to make a detour and get attacked by this thing?
It's destroyed countless Schiff. This is the kind of conquest that speeches are made about and Orden are awarded for.

Fields.MenuText: It does seem like it could be an exciting experience.
We already have a mission though.
Yeah, like eulogies and posthumous medals.

Fields.DialogueText: There's nothing more exciting than real battle. And this Nixen sounds like a worthy Gegner.
Well, this Nixe is practically on the way. We can take them both on.
Schon gut, don't be such a Schwarzseher. Have a little faith in our Zusammenarbeit.
You're really chomping at the bit to take this Morgana on, huh?
I can do it.
I'm sure you can. Let's go.
A massive Morgana indeed. I didn't know they made Morganas in extra, extra, extra, large.
The bigger they are, desto faster I knock them down to size.
Wait, Hipper, look. There's some wreckage over there. It looks fresh. It must've just taken out a ship.
There are probably Überlebende there. We should save them.
*BOOM*

Fields.MenuText: Well, let's focus on not sinking ourselves.
You're right we have to.
We can't ignore the monster staring at us though.

Fields.DialogueText: I won't fall in this fight. I have too much I've yet to do.
We'll rescue as many Überlebende as we can, but we're not leaving here until that Nixe has been defeated.
Natürlich nicht. That was the last Schiff this Nixe will sink. Let's make sure of that.
It's heading our way... You think we can handle this, Kapitän?
I think you can handle anything, Hipper.
That's all I needed to hear. Vorwärts!
@BATTLE
Hipper, you were phenomenal in that last fight.
I don't feel phänomenal.
... I feel like I was an Explosionsmagnet.

Fields.MenuText: No permanent damage done. Which, in itself is impressive.
You saved dozens of survivors while fending off the attacks of a mountainous Morgana. It was commendable.
You might've taken a few hits, but the final strike was yours. And that's the most important part.

Fields.DialogueText: Des is wahr, it could've been much worse.
It was about the size of a Berg wasn't it? You should be sure to note that in your Rapport.
In the end, we won. It makes the Schrammen ache a little less.
Think I could've earned a Orden for that performance in the Gefecht?
If it was up to me? You'd already be decorated in medals from head to toe.
Danke, though I worry that might look a little silly.
You're not wrong.
*ALARM*
Morganas. What do you say we earn another medal?
If it was that easy then the Orden wouldn't be nearly as important.
@BATTLE
All right, we're nearing our target's location. You ready for a fight?
Hmmm... I frage mich... do you think I restocked enough last time we were in a Hafen?
You're worrying about this now?
Well, I just didn't think about how draining that huge Nixe would be on our supplies. What if we run out of Munition in the middle of the fight or something?

Fields.MenuText: Well, then we'll probably die.
Hipper, aren't you the one who said you've never run out of supplies before?
Should we turn around and head back to port then?

Fields.DialogueText: Sag doch so etwas net! I'm already worrying enough.
Ja, I did, but... I don't know.
It'd take so much time. Who knows how much havoc it could wreak while we zipfel.
Hipper, I have enough faith in you to trust that we have more than enough supplies onboard. We'll be fine.
You're probably right. Danke, Kapitän.
@BATTLE
So this is where this dangerous Morgana's been hiding, huh? It's a nice little hiding spot.
It's worrisome, Kapitän. As soon as we head in there, we'll have a hard time getting out.
It'll be easier after we beat her.
I like the confidence.

Fields.MenuText: I've seen how you handle battle. I'm not the only one who should be confident.
It's false bravado, but you know what they say
Really? I was worried I was coming off a little too cocky.

Fields.DialogueText: Ich *bin* zuversichtlich.. Of course I'm confident. What makes you think I'm not?
I've never heard that before. As a Bayerin at heart all I always display *true* bravado!
Just the right amount of frech.
*ALARM*
Great, did we get noticed from outside their little hideout?
Naa. We're getting attacked from the rear. It seems like we were followed here.
So it's an ambush? That makes things more complicated.
It doesn't leave us much time for a Plan, gell?
No, but we've been in worse situations. We'll survive.
We'll do more than that. We'll win. I'm sure of it. Yeah... I'm zuversichtlich.
I'll pretend like I believe you. Come on, let's get ready for a serious fight.
@BATTLE
There's our target. Pretty frightening, right?
Ah, i wo! After what I've seen, this is nothing.
You mean roaches?
Waah. Don't even say that right now!

Fields.MenuText: Sorry, didn't mean to set you off before the fight.
Don't be such a baby.
Can I say bugs? Or insects? Do those still trigger you?

Fields.DialogueText: It's okay, I'm still klar zum Gefecht. Just a little grossed out is all.
I'm not a baby. I'm fine. I just have a few Haare standing straight.
What do you think!?
*BOOM*
That was close. Looks like we're going to have to be careful if we don't want to get caught in Morgana's blasts.
It's a lucky thing I'm so fast then. We can do this. We're stronger than this Nixe.
No arguments here. Let's go.
@BATTLE
That was close. Zu knapp...
We lived. And we won. We did it, Hipper.
Can I now kollabieren?

Fields.MenuText: Permission granted.
Not just yet. Let's get somewhere safe first.
That tired, huh?

Fields.DialogueText: Danke, Kapitän. If you need me, I'll be on the floor.
Do hosd Recht. That's probably for the best.
More like that ramponiert. You can't tell with my Mantel, but my Schrammen have Schrammen.
*ALARM*
We can't even have one moment of rest?
We can rest after we dispatch these Nixen, Kapitän.
Weren't you just about ready to collapse, Hipper?
Passt scho, Kapitän. I'm ready for the next battle.
It's okay to admit if you're a little weary, Hipper. You've gone through a lot of strain.
I said I'm fine. Now, let's prepare for the Nixen. We're not at a hundred percent after that last fight. This could take all we have.
All right, just try not to pass out or anything in the middle of the fight.
Don't be insane. That would never happen. Obviously...
@BATTLE
Kapitän, we're fully stocked and ready for our next assignment.
What do you mean?
Instead of hunting after Morganas, like we've been doing, I'm looking into running a patrol.
A Patrouille? Why? How am I supposed to show what I can do if I'm not in the thick of it?

Fields.MenuText: There is just as much glory in patrol as there is in hunting targets.
Are you really that eager to prove yourself? You've done enough, Hipper.
Hipper. Calm down. It's not the end of the world.

Fields.DialogueText: You're a horrible Lügner.
There are still Nixen in the world. I haven't done nearly enough.
Don't tell me to calm down. Ich bin ruhig! I'm just annoyed.
Look, I... I decided to take a patrol, because I needed a break. All these hectics are running me ragged.
Oh? So... you're tired then?
Yeah, exactly. I'm sure you could run around the world destroying every Morgana that crossed your path, but I'm only human.
